about_the_game:
Procedural Studio

Unearth the power of procedural graphics with Procedural Studio, the ideal tool for technical artists, game developers, and graphic designers. Procedural Studio's robust node-based editor allows you to create realistic terrains, images, 3D objects, and more.

Infinite Flexibility

With Procedural Studio, every project begins with a blank canvas where intricate node-graphs can be constructed to guide the entire workflow. This structure provides endless flexibility, allowing adjustments to any part of the process whenever needed. Forget about irreversible changes and embrace the ability to create dynamic, parameter-driven graphics with ease.

Advanced Feature Set

  • Versatile Node Editor: Advanced tools such as loops, conditional logic, subgraphs, and recursion cater to complex procedural workflows.

  • Expert Image Processing: Images can be generated, loaded, filtered, and combined with precision. Multiple pixel formats and dimensions are supported, ensuring high-quality image processing.

  • Dynamic Mesh Creation: 2D and 3D meshes can be created effortlessly. Unique noise patterns can be applied, and texture coordinates managed to bring designs to life.

  • Authentic Terrain Generation: Stunning terrains can be crafted using hydraulic and thermal erosion techniques. Node-based texturing enhances terrains with realistic effects that mimic natural processes.

Optimized Performance

Procedural Studio ensures a responsive user interface and fast processing, allowing projects to be tackled efficiently. Whether on a high-end workstation or a standard PC, smooth and reliable performance is provided.

Comprehensive Support and Community

Although Procedural Studio is geared toward advanced users, resources are provided to help you get started. Documentation, user guides, quick-help menus, and example projects are available to assist. The community on Steam and Reddit can be joined to reach out to the developer directly.

Discover the Power of Procedural Generation

Procedural Studio is a gateway to pushing the boundaries of creativity in game environments, animated scenes, or architectural visualizations. Dive into a world where every detail is under control, and see what can be achieved with smart, procedural graphics. A free demo is available for non-commercial use to explore all of the capabilities, limited only in the export resolution.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 9350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 - AMD Radeon RX 580
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7 or better
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 2080 - Nvidia Quadro RTX 4000 - AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
